<mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-12-14T09:44:16.443Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/22.1.2 Chrome/114.0.5735.289 Electron/25.9.4 relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="505" y="130" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="505" y="100" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-3" value="Выпущена ли волна из 
источника звуковых волн?" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="130" width="250" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-15" value="Конец" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="390" y="410" width="250" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-16" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;verticalAlign=middle;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-15" target="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-19" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="440" y="710" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="505" y="800" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="515" y="370" /> <mxPoint x="685" y="370" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-17" value="А" style="ellipse;aspect=fixed;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="472.5" y="30" width="65" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-18" value="А" style="ellipse;aspect=fixed;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="112.5" y="1100" width="65" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-19" value="Отрисовать звуковую 
волну в текущий момент времени" style="shape=process;backgroundOutline=1;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="250" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-22" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-3" target="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-19" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="590" y="80" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="640" y="30" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="685" y="175" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-23" value="Да" style="edgeLabel;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-22" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.2615" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-15" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-25" value="" style="endArrow=classic;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="1" source="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-3" target="l8yK2lG1P48qLz4xaju2-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="500" y="260" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="550" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="330" y="175" /> <mxPoint x="330" y="370" /> <mxPoint x="515" y="370" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-2" value="Вычислить освещенность полигона, 
используя модель освещения Фонга" style="shape=process;backgroundOutline=1;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="610" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-3" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-4" target="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="155" y="908" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="155" y="868" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-4" value="Выполнить простую закраску 
полигона" style="shape=process;backgroundOutline=1;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="710" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-5" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="NcBD8KHW1xywwwPwmANA-35" target="PBbFLBZ0SfkGOgfMzEFs-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="155" y="790" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="155" y="750" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
